description: A great way to use leftovers, I had rice, bacon and vegetables all leftover, so put them to good use.
name: Pie Maker Rice Patties Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup cooked peas (you could use frozen, i just had leftovers)
1 tbs mixed herbs (i use braggs sprinkle)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together all ingredients, ensuring egg is thoroughly mixed through. You need to make sure the egg don't just sit at the bottom of the bowl.
Spray pie maker with oil and heat for another minute.

Place a big heaped 1/2 cup measure into each hole, and bake for around 10 minutes. Each pie maker may be different so you are looking for a nice deep golden crisp bottom. Gently lift, and flip over to other side for another 8 or so minutes til golden.
